name: OnLevelSelect_4
_source: speak;Narrator;With her bracelet recovered, Eirika sets out with renewed determination.;;;narration

speak;Narrator;Passing through the ancient forest Za'ha brings them close to Grado's border.{br}As they near the town of Serafew, Eirika's fears are assuaged by the lack of troops.{br}But never-before-seen terrors crawl in the shadows of the trees.;;;narration
